ZODB allows arbitrary nesting of objects and children and children, just like an arbitrarirly deeply nested dictionary.  No farting around with child/parent attributes like in SQL's rectangular shaped DBs
But there are ORM-ish (modeling) solutions for ZODB (like the flask-zodb ext)
